title: Financial Analyst, Operations Finance
summary: This is a crucial position that has key responsibility to handle full spectrum of large equipment management for manufacturing process and factory costing to support expansion in a complicated and fast-paced environment. This is an excellent opportunity to join an entrepreneurial and global technology leading company and to grow Finance expertise.
description: Business Operation Support -  Take end-to-end responsibility on Reimbursed assets from Purchase requisition review, Goods receipts (GR) document validation including production output method pursuant to the company policy and guidance, and troubleshooting of any issues that may arise...
preferred_qualifications: Strong organizational skills and attention to detail and comfortable working in a dynamic environment with a lot of ambiguity, Process focused, with ability to lean new processes and drive improvement...
